name: Colonizer Training Camp
text: Oxygen must be 5% or less.

name: Asteroid Mining Consortium
text: Requires that you have titanium production. Decrease any titanium production 1 step and increase your own 1 step.

name: Search For Life
text: Oxygen must be 6% or less. 3 VPs if you have one or more science resource here.; Action: Spend 1 MC to reveal and discard the top card of the draw deck. If that card has a microbe tag, add a science resource here.

name: Inventors' Guild
text: Action: Look at the top card and either buy it or discard it

name: Martian Rails
text: Action: Spend 1 energy to gain 1 MC for each city tile ON MARS.

name: Capital
